docs.snippet: In the ornate marine Presidental palace in Guatemala City last Friday evening, President Carlos Castillo Armas escorted his wife, Odilia Palomo, to dinner after a palace reception. As the pair approached the dining room a palace guard presented arms,...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the ornate marine Presidental palace in Guatemala City last Friday evening, President Carlos Castillo Armas escorted his wife, Odilia Palomo, to dinner after a palace reception. As the pair approached the dining room a palace guard presented arms, raised his rifle and fired four shots. The President toppled. He died instantly.

headline.main: Assassination; Of Guatemala President Castillo's Problems Assassin Kills Self

docs.snippet: The International Bank for Reconstruction and Development operated at a profit of $36,000,000 in the fiscal year ended June 30. This brought the total reserves of the lending institution to $289,000,000 after eleven years in business.
docs.lead_paragraph: The International Bank for Reconstruction and Development operated at a profit of $36,000,000 in the fiscal year ended June 30. This brought the total reserves of the lending institution to $289,000,000 after eleven years in business.
docs.abstract: fiscal '57 rept; profits $36 million; 20 loans made to 15 nations
